author: Ilya Oskin
title: ErgoDex Plutus Port
description: We need a non-custodial decentralized exchange allowing us to transfer a liquidity over the Cardano network easy, fast and secure.
solution: ErgoDEX - a decentralized exchange that combines AMM with OrderBook in a single app in order to provide best user experience.
experience: Team has a solid background in core and ecosystem development with projects including Ergo and Scorex.
